landing.subtitle: the free and open-source note taking platform
landing.betaKeyNotice: during development phase a beta-key might be required for signup.

markdown.title: Support for Markdown
markdown.body: WriteUp follows the CommonMark-Spec with custom additions such as GFM and unicode-emoji-support so that your notes will always stay readable und well structured.

organization.title: Easy organization
organization.body: Using tags writeUp offers a simple and dynamic overview over both your own notes and those that have been shared with you.
organization.note: Keeping track has never been this easy!

sharing.title: Simple Sharing
sharing.body: With but a few clicks you can open up your note to your friends or colleagues. Give them the permission to read your note, let them edit it, or revoke their access again.
sharing.footnote: This feature may be unavailable or only partially available during development.

far.title: Fast and Reliable
far.body: Built on ReactJS and written in Typescript writeUp's frontend offers a reliable and intuitive interface to manage your notes with. Combined with its blazing fast rust backend you'll never have to wait for a change to take place.

notes.deleteWarning: This process can not be undone.
notes.deleteSkipTip: You can skip this dialog by holding {{key}}.
notes.title: Title
